comment:
Variables:
- \( x \): number of regular boat trips
- \( y \): number of speed boat trips

Constants:
- Regular boat capacity: 20 pieces of mail per trip
- Regular boat gas usage: 10 liters per trip
- Speed boat capacity: 30 pieces of mail per trip
- Speed boat gas usage: 20 liters per trip
- Maximum regular boat trips: 20
- Minimum percentage of trips made by speed boats: 50%
- Total pieces of mail to deliver: 1000

Objective:
Minimize the total amount of gas consumed

Constraints:
1. \( x \leq 20 \) (maximum regular boat trips)
2. \( y \geq 0.5(x+y) \) (at least 50% of trips made by speed boats)
3. \( 20x + 30y \geq 1000 \) (total pieces of mail to deliver)
